Summary: going to work and noticed shiny ball like objects.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas on my way to work on September 8 at 7:30 am when I noticed a shiny ball like object in the sky (I thought was ahead of me). I keep a video recorder in my car all the time and took a video of the object while driving. I was in shock when I looked at the video the other day. As I continued to shoot at the object 3 to 4 more appear in the frame but I never saw them while shooting the video because they were over the roof of my truck. So when I looked at the footage I couldn't believe what I saw. The first object would kind of blip out and then show up again all the while the other 4 stayed in frame and noticeable. Then the one at the bottom of the triangle does the same thing. I have a dark gray plastic dashboard so I have ruled out a reflection.
